## Bio

I am a senior at the University of California, Los Angeles, majoring in Statistics and Data Science with a minor in Data Science Engineering. My interests lie at the intersection of artificial intelligence and medical imaging. I have conducted research at the University of Copenhagen and expanded my expertise in deep learning through coursework at UCLA, focusing on its applications in medical image processing. My goal is to work at a company committed to using technology to make a meaningful impact on the world.
